user.title: Metlink Explorer Setup
user.description: Enter your Metlink Open Data API key to get started. You can get a free API key from the Metlink Open Data Developer Portal. See the Metlink Explorer documentation for more details. README.md for the link.

transportation_type.title: Select Transportation Type
transportation_type.description:
Choose the type of transport you want to monitor.

*Note: Only transportation types with available routes are shown. If you don't see a type, all routes for that transport mode may already be configured.

route_selection.title: Select Route
route_selection.description: Choose the specific route you want to monitor.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your key and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Metlink API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.no_routes_found: No routes found for the selected transportation type.
error.no_routes_available: No available routes for the selected transportation type. All routes may already be configured.
error.no_transportation_types_available: No transportation types with available routes found. All routes may already be configured.
